record.jsxtip: The CSS background color of odd rows.
The CSS background color of even rows.
The CSS background color of branching nodes in hierarchical grids.
If 1, records with children or @jsxcategory='1' are rendered full row. Suppress with @jsxcategory='0'
The CSS background font weight of branching nodes in hierarchical grids.
The number of pixels to indent for each level of a hierarchical grid.
If '1', the jsxtip CDF attribute is not used as the row tooltip.
If '1', branches of all leaves in hierarchical grids are not indented by the width of the plus/minus icon.
The CDF attribute to sort records on. If this attribute is not provided, the matrix rows are rendered in the order that they appear in the CDF document.
The sort direction if the jsxsortpath attribute is provided. Either 'ascending' or 'descending'.
The sort data type if the jsxsortpath attribute is provided. Either 'text' or 'number'.
CSS to apply to the auto-append row (a TR element)
If '0', the jsximg CDF attribute is not resolved as a URL.
The title of the content of the matrix for use in loading, error, and timeout messages.
User attribute 1.
User attribute 2.
